page.title: 18LIFE STYLE HOBBIES INTERESTS
page.content: {STREET SURVEY OF HOBBIES AND INTERESTS The following survey conducted in Kibworth Beauchamp in June 1985 showed a very wide range of hobbies and interests pursued by people of all ages.A total of 136 seperate activities were given by those questioned. The most popular recreational activity was gardening, closely followed by reading and knitting. Swimming, sewing and travel were next in order. Tennis and badminton were the most popular organised sports followed by football and golf. Walking and cooking were equal in popularity as were horse riding and squash. Next in order came cycling, darts and dancing. Photography, music and painting again were approximately equal.
